title: Healthcare Data Specialist

sections.full_text:
Healthcare Data Specialist
MedNova Halifax, NS

Responsibilities:
- Analyze and validate EHR datasets
- Ensure HL7 and clinical reporting compliance
- Build automated data cleansing scripts
- Collaborate with clinical research teams
sections.skills:
- SQL, Python, R
- Healthcare standards (HL7, ICD)
- Data validation techniques

Preferred:
